title: Police Stories: Zombie Case DLC (Steam) Giveaway
description: Score Police Stories: Zombie Case (DLC) for free via Steam and unlock 5 new missions full of unexpected twists and zombies. Please note the base game Police Stories is required to enjoy this DLC content.
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Download this DLC directly via Steam before the offer expires.
3. Don´t forget to install the base game on Steam.

title: World of Tanks - Final Frontier Pack (Steam) Giveaway
description: Claim your free World of Tanks Final Frontier Pack DLC on Steam and unlock unique Star Trek-themed decals plus boosters giving an extra impulse to your progress in the game! Please note the base game World of Tanks (Free-to-play) is required to enjoy this content.
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Download this DLC directly via Steam before the offer expires.
3. Don´t forget to install the base game World of Tanks (free-to-play) on Steam.

title: EVERSPACE 2 Decal DLC Steam Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Steam key and unlock the "Alienware decal" for your ships in EVERSPACE 2! Please note the base game EVERSPACE 2 on Steam is required to enjoy this content.
instructions:
1. Login into your free Alienware account and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Launch the Steam client and click the Games menu option.
3. Choose "activate a Product on Steam" to redeem your Steam key.

title: Zero King (Beta) Steam Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Zero King Beta Steam Key and join the beta test today! Plus by joining this beta, you'll have a chance to unlock a limited edition ship! Zero King is a free-to-play post-apocalyptic, 4v4 King of the Hill style online PvP battle arenas. Check it out!
instructions:
1. Login into your free Alienware account and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Launch the Steam client and click the Games menu option.
3. Choose "activate a Product on Steam" to redeem your Steam key.

title: Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth - Special Outfit: Hello Work Employee Giveaway
description: Claim your free Special Outfit: Hello Work Employee (Ichiban) DLC for Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth on Steam!
instructions:
1. Download this DLC directly via Steam before expires.
2. Don´t forget to install the base game Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth(required) to enjoy this DLC content.

title: M.O.O.D.S. Prologue Steam Key Giveaway

instructions:

title: Age of Wonders 4: Special Godir Helmet Steam Key Giveaway

instructions:

title: World of Warplanes: Curtiss XP-31 Pack (Steam)

instructions:

2. Please note the base game World of Warplanes (free-to-play) is required to enjoy this content.

title: Fangs Heroic Founder's Pack Key Giveaway

2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key (Please note the key must be redeemed in-game).

title: Realm Royale - We're Bok! Bundle DLC (Steam)

instructions:

2. Please note the base game Realm Royale Reforged (free-to-play) is required to enjoy this DLC content.

title: Destiny 2: Be True Emblem Code
description:
Claim your Destiny 2: Be True Emblem Code for free! Find the code below and follow the instructions to redeem your Emblem code.

CODE: ML3-FD4-ND9
instructions:
1. Navigate to the Destiny 2 code redemption page (click on the "Get Loot" button).
2. Choose your platform, sign in to your platform account, then just add your code and redeem it.
platforms: PC, Steam, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4, Xbox One
